Html:
Hi to everyone,

I'm having problems when deploying adobe flash player through wsus package publisher.
My computer detects the update but i get this error 0x80244022.

What is wrong?

Thanks in advance

Are sure of your error code ?
80244022 = Http status 503 - temporarily overloaded

Can you send me by mail the file : C:\Windows\WindowsUpdate.log at package.publisher@free.fr
